text: Candida Royalle (October 15, 1950 â€“ September 7, 2015) was an American pornographic actress, director and producer. In 1984, Royalle founded Femme Productions. Royalle was a member of American Association of Sex Educators, Counselors and Therapists. She was born in New York City. Royalle died on September 7, 2015 of ovarian cancer in Mattituck, New York, aged 64. ==References== ==Other websites== * Candida Royalle's Website * Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie directors Category:American pornographic actors Category:American sex industry businesspeople Category:Deaths from ovarian cancer Category:Movie directors from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Pornographic movie directors Category:Pornographic movie producers
